channel.title: How do i put an ip on my server so other people can go on?
channel.description: hey all you gamers, i need soemone really good with moparscape servers to help me and explain to me how i put the ip on my server right now the ip is 127.0.0.1 and thats boring to play without anybody on the server with you, could you help?

item.dc:creator: @xx_ciao_xx imanubnoob
item.description:
@xx_ciao_xx wrote:

paintball10:

127.0.0.1 is not your computer ip…thats the moparscaoe default ip…you need to figure out what your ip is and tell your friend to try that ip…and u put that ip that u foudn to connect 127.0.0.1 will jsut take you to moparscape default server…

i agree i never said i told him default ip did i? i told him my ip i made on no-ip

item.title: How do i put an ip on my server so other people can go on?
item.dc:creator: @Luvodicus Luvodicus
item.description:
@Luvodicus wrote:

If you downloaded the No-IP program (no-ip DUC) and have it running, the player logs to your server using the no-ip address you set up… (PrivateServer.no-ip.biz)

Read full topic

item.source: How do i put an ip on my server so other people can go on?

item.title: How do i put an ip on my server so other people can go on?
item.dc:creator: @Luvodicus Luvodicus
item.description:
@Luvodicus wrote:

add a new no-ip address at your www.no-ip.com account

when you download the No-IP DUC, you’ll sign in with your no-ip account… it checks your current IP, updates it to the no-ip.com website, and anyone who logs into your no-ip address (PrivateServer.no-ip.biz) it will forward to your private IP address…

just turn off your firewall, and only play the private server… dont browse the internet or download unless you need to…

you should be fine…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i put an ip on my server so other people can go on?

item.title: How do i put an ip on my server so other people can go on?
item.dc:creator: @DragonGuild DragonGuild
item.description:
@DragonGuild wrote:

If you hadnt found any useful help, heres some explaining.

Runserver: 0.0.0.0:43594

Your server is online. Its port is 43594.

IP: 127.0.0.1

This ip redirects the server to your ip. It connects to you.
For example, MoparScape Client.

-Hope I helped.

P,S, look in the tutorial section. If i helped post a new thread on any questions you have.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i put an ip on my server so other people can go on?

item.title: How do i put an ip on my server so other people can go on?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Basically do this, go to www.no-ip.com, make an account, then click “add” and add a no-ip,

then download no-ip duc and open it and check your ip

Then try to put it up on status to see if it the ip works, if it doesnt try to port forward… and that is how you get a ip for your server…

Or just use the number ip on ur comp like 65.24.115.113 or someting… lol

Read full topic
